# Government Tender Announcement
## Notice of Cancellation
[Public Works and Government Services Canada](https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Solicitation Information
#### Solicitation Number
* PW-__HL-642-81446
* Amendments: 0

#### Notice Details
* Status: Cancelled
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Notice Date: November 10, 2022
* Closing Date: December 20, 2022

#### Procurement Details
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Period of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Expected Contract Dates: N/A

#### Trade Agreements
Contractors may be eligible under the following agreements:
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

#### Contact Information
* Procurement Entity: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* Contact Person: Richard Tea
* Email: richard.tea@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 574-2675

---

This notice is a formal document announcing the cancellation of a tender. The solicitation number is PW-__HL-642-81446, and no amendments have been made.

This notice is directed towards contractors who were interested in submitting a proposal for a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Laboratory Equipment and Supplies.

By providing this notice, Public Works and Government Services Canada is canceling the tender and dismissing all interested contractors. 

Please note that this is a mandatory announcement, and no further extensions or updates are planned. 

Some useful details to note from this reformatted entry include: 
* The solicitation number is PW-__HL-642-81446 and has no amendments.
* The notice type is Request for Proposal (RFP).
* The status of the notice is cancelled.
* The notice was published on November 10, 2022, and the closing date was December 20, 2022.
* Contractors may be eligible for this solicitation under specific trade agreements, listed
